column4: i use postfix. when i installed at, it ended up installing courier, which overwrote my newliases executable. after removing courier, newaliases no longer exists. what would be the best way to replace the file, which comes with postfix?
dovecot is imap, postfix is smtp
you wrote you used courier, that's why i asked why not using dovecot
oh. no, installing at caused courier to get installed
but to answer your question, you should reinstall postfix for newaliases
i did a manual tarball installation of mailscanner with spamassassin and clamav
now i realize that it would be much more organized to use the packages
so now i gotta locate all these files and delete them and then install mailscanner from the package :P
it's better to use native packages in most cases
